text: -Woman, how much has this smudge cost you? -1,90. -How, so much? But it is a barbaric thing! - Yes, the holes are very expensive. With this of war they take advantage of everything. -You could have bought it without them! - But then it would be a slingshot and no longer useful for slinging. - It doesn't matter; you don't have to pay more. They are products of the needle market. FIN Cuadernos de todo y nada, 1972
title: Artificios
author: Macedonio Fernández
